insert.p: Given the research and technological advances in recent years and the rapidly evolving landscape with respect to UAS applications, the aim of this paper is to review the current state of the art in the field of UAS applications for environmental monitoring, with a particular focus on hydrological variables, such as vegetation conditions, soil properties and moisture, overland flow, and streamflow.
